description: Discharge of Obligation of S106 Agreement dated 29th April 2022, Schedule 3, Clause 1.1 - the submission to the HDM of the Public Art Installation Scheme for the purposes of approval , prior to the Occupation of the Development of planning permission 22/02062/FUL and 21/00332/FUL.
site_name: Lidl Foodstore153 - 161 London RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6NU
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Clause 1.1 of Schedule of  the Legal Agreement dated  29th April 2022 can be discharged.
